description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler in C++ which declares virtual methods for handling various events related to runtime, window management, ripple, and state changes, using JSON objects and strings.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: Interface class for handling different event callbacks in the WPEFramework plugin architecture.

methods.name: onRuntimeManagerEvent
methods.description: Handles a runtime management event with provided JSON data.

methods.name: onWindowManagerEvent
methods.description: Handles a window management event with provided JSON data.

methods.name: onRippleEvent
methods.description: Handles a ripple event identified by name, with additional data in JSON format.

methods.name: onStateChangeEvent
methods.description: Handles a state change event with provided JSON data.
